This is how the [[creative inventory]] was organized in [[Pocket Edition v0.8.0 alpha]]. Blocks and items that were added in 0.8.0 are colored <span style="color:darkviolet">purple</span>. Blocks and items that were not legitimately accessible before 0.8.0 are colored <span style="color:red">red</span>. Other blocks and items that were not in it in 0.7.6 are colored <span style="color:chocolate">orange</span>.
